title: What are the basic electronic devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well,This is very common question when come to understand the important electronic Devices. Diodes,Transistor,Thyristors,FETs, MosFETs,Amplifiers,OP-AMP,IGBT,IGCT excetra are the main electronic components used in the electronic devices. So to understand these devices we must understand all the types of mentioned elements, their characteristics and working principle. There are numerous applications of these devices in switching,regulating,controlling and transforming the power aa well as signals. This is general view,however they are very specific in nature and should be understood properly before going for any real application.
